CustomField.formula:
IF(
right(TEXT( Load_Zone_Utility_4__c ),5) = 'SCE&G',
right(TEXT( Load_Zone_Utility_4__c ),5),
IF(
right(TEXT( Load_Zone_Utility_4__c ),10) = 'Eversource',
right(TEXT( Load_Zone_Utility_4__c ),10),
IF(
right(TEXT( Load_Zone_Utility_4__c ),13) = 'National Grid',
right(TEXT( Load_Zone_Utility_4__c ),13),
IF(
right(TEXT( Load_Zone_Utility_4__c ),6) = 'Unitil',
right(TEXT( Load_Zone_Utility_4__c ),6),
IF(
right(TEXT( Load_Zone_Utility_4__c ),29) = 'Municipal Electric Department',
right(TEXT( Load_Zone_Utility_4__c ),29),
IF(
TEXT( Load_Zone_Utility_4__c ) = 'Manual Lookup Required',
'Manual Lookup Required', null))))))
CustomField.label: Utility (OLD)
